addNetworks.title: Ongeraho Imiyoboro mu Mufuka
addNetworks.description: Kanda kuri buri muyoboro kugirango uwongere muri MetaMask, Rabby, cyangwa indi mifuka ya Web3

addNetwork.error: Kunanirwa kongeraho umuyoboro. Nyamuneka ongeraho wowe ubwawe.

networkWarning.title: Urunigi Rutari rwo
networkWarning.message: Guhindura Token biboneka gusa kuri BSC Chain. Nyamuneka hindura kuri BSC kugirango uhindure tokens zawe za kera.

confirmModal.title: Emeza Guhindura
confirmModal.warning: Ugiye guhindura tokens zawe. Nyamuneka soma ibikurikira witonze mbere yo gukomeza.
confirmModal.burnExplanation: Tokens zawe za {{legacySymbol}} zizatwikwa burundu (zoherezwe kuri aderesi yapfuye) kandi ingano ingana ya tokens {{newSymbol}} izacurwa mu mufuka wawe. Ibi ntibishobora guhindurwa.
confirmModal.positiveNote: Icyiza: {{newSymbol}} ntigira umusoro na busa — nta misoro ya 10%+ kuri buri gikorwa.

finalConfirmModal.title: Uraho neza?
finalConfirmModal.message: Aya ni amahirwe yawe ya nyuma yo guhagarika. Iyo umaze kwemeza, {{legacySymbol}} yawe izahindurwa muri {{newSymbol}} kandi ntishobora guhindurwa ukundi.

bridge.historyStoredLocally: Amateka y'ibikorwa abitswe kuri iki gikoresho

settings.title: Igenamiterere
settings.rpcEndpointsHelp: Kuvugurura RPC URL ikoreshwa ku runigi ruri wese mu bidukikije byatoranijwe.
settings.noChainsConfigured: Nta runigi rwateguwe kuri ibi bidukikije.

banner.title: Mushya hano?
banner.message: Wige ku bijyanye na Freedom Bridge n'uko wakwohereza TigerOG tokens ku minyururu itandukanye.
banner.note: Icyitonderwa: Guhindura token ni burundu kandi ntibishobora guhindurwa.

hero.title: Bohora <1/> <2>Umutungo</2> Wawe
hero.subtitle: Ohereza TigerOG tokens nta nkomyi ku minyururu itandukanye ukoresheje Axelar Interchain Token Service. Biratekanye, birihuta, kandi nta musoro.

features.title: Interchain Token Service
features.description: Freedom Bridge ikoresha protocol ya Axelar ITS kugirango itange uburambe bwo kohereza butagira ikibazo, bwizewe, kandi butarimo umusoro mu ma blockchains {{count}}+.

stopDecay.title: Hagarika Kwangirika
stopDecay.description: Tokens za kera zitwika 10-11% by'agaciro kawe kuri buri kugura no kugurisha. Guhindura muri TigerOG bihagarika iki gihombo ako kanya, kubika 100% by'agaciro kawe.

conversion.title: 1:1 Guhindura
conversion.description: Ingano yose ntabwo ihinduka. Tokens zifunze muri kasho yizewe yo kwimuka, kandi ingano ingana neza ya 1:1 irakoreshwa. Nta gutakaza agaciro, nta kuvanga.

multichain.title: Imirongo Myinshi
multichain.description: Shyiraho rimwe, gera hose. Umutungo wawe uhinduka umuturage kavukire wa interchain ku minyururu myinshi harimo Ethereum, BNB Chain, Base, n'izindi.

security.title: Umutekano wa Axelar
security.description: Ikoreshwa n'urusobe rw'abagenzuzi ba Axelar. ITS yemeza ko tokens zawe zoherezwa neza kandi zikahagera zifite agaciro kamwe ku miyoboro yose ihujwe.

cta.title: Witeguye kwigenga?
cta.description: Injira mu mpinduramatwara ya interchain. Bifata munsi y'umunota umwe gupfunyika umutungo wawe no gutangira kohereza ukoresheje Axelar.

buyTokens.title: Kugura Umutungo
buyTokens.description: Nta tokens ufite? Gura tokens z'umwimerere kuri PancakeSwap, hanyuma uzihindure muri verisiyo nshya z'imiyoboro myinshi.

header.title: Inyandiko
header.subtitle: Wige uburyo bwo guhindura tokens za kera no kohereza hagati y'iminyururu.

whatIs.title: Freedom Bridge ni iki?
whatIs.content: Freedom Bridge ni protocol idahuriweho yagenewe kubohora tokens za kera ku misoro y'ubucuruzi yo hejuru n'imipaka y'urunigi rumwe. Muguhindura tokens zisanzwe mu mitungo ya interchain, abakoresha bashobora kwimura agaciro kabo mu bwisanzure mu ma blockchains ashyigikiwe.
whatIs.taxFreeDesc: Tokens za kera akenshi ziba zifite imisoro 10%+. Tokens za TigerOG zifite umusoro wa 0.
whatIs.omnichainDesc: Imura umutungo ako kanya hagati ya blockchains {{count}}+ ukoresheje Axelar.

howToConvert.title: Uburyo bwo Guhindura Tokens
howToConvert.step1: Huza umufuka wawe n'urunigi rw'inkomoko (urugero, BNB Chain).
howToConvert.step3: Hitamo token ya kera ushaka guhindura.
howToConvert.step4: Emeza amasezerano ya Guhindura kugirango ukoreshe tokens zawe.
howToConvert.step5: Kanda Guhindura kugirango ubike tokens zawe za kera kandi wakire ingano ingana ya tokens "TigerOG".
howToConvert.note: Icyitonderwa: Guhindura bitera umusoro w'ubucuruzi wa token ya kera (mugihe cyo kuzamura) niba token yawe yishyuza umusoro ku kohereza. Nyamara, iyo imaze guhindurwa muri TigerOG, kohereza no kwambuka byose bikurikira biba bideze uwo musoro.

supportedNetworks.title: Imiyoboro Ishyigikiwe
supportedNetworks.content: Freedom Bridge ishyigikiwe urusobe rw'ibinyabuzima rwa blockchains {{count}}+ ruri kwiyongera, bituma habaho gukorana ntamakemwa muri EVM landscape ukoresheje Axelar.

xerc20.title: Tokens za Interchain
xerc20.content: Axelar Interchain Token Service (ITS) yemerera tokens gushyirwa ku minyururu myinshi hamwe na aderesi idahinduka n'imicungire y'ingano ihuriweho. Freedom Bridge ikoresha ITS kugirango yizere ko TigerOG iguma ari umutungo wemewe aho yoherejwe hose.

axelar.title: Urunigi rwa Axelar
axelar.content: Dukoresha Axelar nka layer yacu yo gukorana. Axelar ni urunigi rudahuriweho ruhuza blockchains zitandukanye, rugatuma habaho itumanaho ryizewe rya cross-chain no kohereza umutungo. Icyitegererezo cy'umutekano cya Axelar cyishingikiriza ku itsinda ry'abagenzuzi ridakeneye uruhushya, ritanga umutekano wo hejuru kuri tokens za interchain.

conversion.title: Imikorere yo Guhindura
conversion.content: Amasezerano ya Guhindura yashyizweho kuri BSC. Iyo uhinduye, tokens zawe za kera zoherezwa kuri aderesi yapfuye (zitwitswe burundu) kandi ukakira TigerOG ku gipimo cya 1:1. Iyi ni inzira imwe — tokens za kera zirasenywa kandi ntizishobora kugarurwa.

security.title: Icyitegererezo cy'Umutekano
security.content: Umutekano wubatswe muri buri gice cya Freedom Bridge:
security.point1: Imiterere yo Guhindura: Tokens za kera zitwikwa burundu binyuze mu masezerano y'ubwenge yagenzuwe, adahinduka.
security.point2: Axelar Validators: Ubutumwa bwa cross-chain bugenzurwa n'urusobe rudahuriweho rwa Axelar.
security.point3: Ingano Idahinduka: ITS icunga gucura no gutwika kugirango ingano yose igume idahinduka ku minyururu yose.
security.point4: Logic Yagenzuwe: Yubatswe ku masomero asanzwe ya Axelar na OpenZeppelin.

supplyCommon.verificationDesc: Imibare yose y'ingano ishobora kugenzurwa wigenga kuri chain:

tigerogSupply.title: Isesengura ry'Ingano ya TigerOG
tigerogSupply.intro: TigerOG ifite ingano idahinduka mu isoko ikomoka kuri token ya BNBTiger y'umwimerere. Kubara ingano bifata tokens zose zatwitswe n'izifunze burundu.
tigerogSupply.deadAddressDesc: Tokens zoherejwe kuri 0x000...dEaD zatwitswe burundu kandi ntizishobora kugarurwa. Ibi birimo tokens zatwitswe binyuze mu buryo bwa musoro bwa BNBTiger y'umwimerere.
tigerogSupply.contractBalanceDesc: Amafaranga make ya tokens yafunganye muri contract ya BNBTiger ubwayo. Izi tokens ntizishobora kugerwaho kandi zakuwe mu isoko.
tigerogSupply.lpLockedDesc: Ikidendezi cya PancakeSwap kirimo tokens za BNBTiger zifatanije na BNB. Iyo tokens za LP zitwitswe (zoherejwe kuri aderesi yapfuye), tokens ziri inyuma mu kidendezi zifunga burundu.
tigerogSupply.lpBurnedPercent: Tokens za LP zatwitswe: 86.18% bya tokens za LP zose
tigerogSupply.lpLockedPercent: Bityo, 86.18% bya tokens muri LP zifunze burundu
tigerogSupply.note: Icyitonderwa: TigerOG igumana igipimo cya 1:1 na BNBTiger mugihe cyo guhindura. Ingano ya TigerOG mu isoko ihura n'ingano nyayo ya BNBTiger mu isoko nyuma yo kubara tokens zose zatwitswe n'izifunze.
tigerogSupply.launchData: Amakuru yo Gutangiza: Iyi mibare yabazwe igihe cyo gutangiza. Token ya BNBTiger ishaje ikomeza gutwika tokens kuri buri gikorwa cyo kugura/kugurisha, bityo ingano nyayo mu isoko ishobora kuba munsi gato y'iyerekanwe.

lionogSupply.title: Isesengura ry'Ingano ya LionOG
lionogSupply.intro: LionOG ifite ingano idahinduka mu isoko ikomoka kuri token ya BNBLion y'umwimerere. Kubara ingano bifata tokens zose zatwitswe n'izifunze burundu.
lionogSupply.deadAddressDesc: Tokens zoherejwe kuri 0x000...dEaD zatwitswe burundu kandi ntizishobora kugarurwa. Ibi birimo tokens zatwitswe binyuze mu buryo bwa musoro bwa BNBLion y'umwimerere.
lionogSupply.contractBalanceDesc: Amafaranga make ya tokens yafunganye muri contract ya BNBLion ubwayo. Izi tokens ntizishobora kugerwaho kandi zakuwe mu isoko.
lionogSupply.lpLockedDesc: Ikidendezi cya PancakeSwap kirimo tokens za BNBLion zifatanije na BNB. Iyo tokens za LP zitwitswe (zoherejwe kuri aderesi yapfuye), tokens ziri inyuma mu kidendezi zifunga burundu.
lionogSupply.lpBurnedPercent: Tokens za LP zatwitswe: 99.98% bya tokens za LP zose
lionogSupply.lpLockedPercent: Bityo, 99.98% bya tokens muri LP zifunze burundu
lionogSupply.note: Icyitonderwa: LionOG igumana igipimo cya 1:1 na BNBLion mugihe cyo guhindura. Ingano ya LionOG mu isoko ihura n'ingano nyayo ya BNBLion mu isoko nyuma yo kubara tokens zose zatwitswe n'izifunze.
lionogSupply.launchData: Amakuru yo Gutangiza: Iyi mibare yabazwe igihe cyo gutangiza. Token ya BNBLion ishaje ikomeza gutwika tokens kuri buri gikorwa cyo kugura/kugurisha, bityo ingano nyayo mu isoko ishobora kuba munsi gato y'iyerekanwe.

frogogSupply.title: Isesengura ry'Ingano ya FrogOG
frogogSupply.intro: FrogOG ifite ingano idahinduka mu isoko ikomoka kuri token ya BNBFrog y'umwimerere. Kubara ingano bifata tokens zose zatwitswe n'izifunze burundu.
frogogSupply.deadAddressDesc: Tokens zoherejwe kuri 0x000...dEaD zatwitswe burundu kandi ntizishobora kugarurwa. Ibi birimo tokens zatwitswe binyuze mu buryo bwa musoro bwa BNBFrog y'umwimerere.
frogogSupply.contractBalanceDesc: Amafaranga make ya tokens yafunganye muri contract ya BNBFrog ubwayo. Izi tokens ntizishobora kugerwaho kandi zakuwe mu isoko.
frogogSupply.lpLockedDesc: Ikidendezi cya PancakeSwap kirimo tokens za BNBFrog zifatanije na BNB. Iyo tokens za LP zitwitswe (zoherejwe kuri aderesi yapfuye), tokens ziri inyuma mu kidendezi zifunga burundu.
frogogSupply.lpBurnedPercent: Tokens za LP zatwitswe: 99.31% bya tokens za LP zose
frogogSupply.lpLockedPercent: Bityo, 99.31% bya tokens muri LP zifunze burundu
frogogSupply.note: Icyitonderwa: FrogOG igumana igipimo cya 1:1 na BNBFrog mugihe cyo guhindura. Ingano ya FrogOG mu isoko ihura n'ingano nyayo ya BNBFrog mu isoko nyuma yo kubara tokens zose zatwitswe n'izifunze.
frogogSupply.launchData: Amakuru yo Gutangiza: Iyi mibare yabazwe igihe cyo gutangiza. Token ya BNBFrog ishaje ikomeza gutwika tokens kuri buri gikorwa cyo kugura/kugurisha, bityo ingano nyayo mu isoko ishobora kuba munsi gato y'iyerekanwe.

contracts.title: Aderesi z'Amasezerano

header.title: Amasezerano y'Ubwenge
header.subtitle: Aderesi zo gushyiraho zemewe za tokens n'ibiraro muri ecosystem ya Freedom Bridge.

interchainTokens.title: Tokens za Interchain
interchainTokens.description: Tokens za Interchain zoherejwe binyuze kuri Axelar Interchain Token Service (ITS). Izi tokens zigumana aderesi idahinduka ku minyururu yose ishyigikiwe.

axelarNetwork.title: Urunigi rwa Axelar
axelarNetwork.description: Protocol y'ubutumwa bw'ibanze ituma kohereza hagati y'iminyururu biba byizewe kandi ikarinda ubusugire bw'amakuru hagati ya blockchains zitandukanye.

conversionContracts.title: Amasezerano yo Guhindura
conversionContracts.description: Ashinzwe guhindura tokens za kera mu mitungo ya interchain. Aya masezerano acunga imikorere yo kubitsa no gucura ku runigi rw'inkomoko.

conversionContractsTable.title: Aderesi z'Amasezerano yo Guhindura
conversionContractsTable.subtitle: Aya masezerano kuri BSC acunga ihindurwa rya tokens za kera zikaba tokens za interchain.

liquidityPools.title: Ibidendezi by'Imari
liquidityPools.description: Ibidendezi by'imari bya DEX ushobora gucururizamo tokens za OG ku minyururu itandukanye.

liquidityPoolsTable.title: Ibidendezi by'Imari
liquidityPoolsTable.subtitle: Ibidendezi bya DEX byo gucuruza tokens za OG

contracts.interchainAsset: Umutungo wa Interchain binyuze kuri Axelar ITS

faq.title: Ubufasha bwa Freedom Bridge
faq.subtitle: Ibisubizo ku bibazo bisanzwe bijyanye na TigerOG, kohereza, na Axelar.

cta.title: Uragifite ibibazo?
cta.description: Injira mu muryango wacu kuri Telegram cyangwa urebe Wiki irambuye kugirango ubone ibitabo bya tekiniki.

questions.q1: Intego yo guhindura tokens zanjye ni iyihe?
questions.a1: Guhindura tokens zawe muri TigerOG bikuraho umusoro w'ubucuruzi (akenshi 10-12%) ufitanye isano na token ya kera. Ikemerera kandi kohereza izo tokens ku yandi ma blockchains nka Ethereum, Base, n'andi uciye kuri Axelar, bigatuma ubona ecosystem nshya.
questions.a2: Yego. Protocol ikoresha amasezerano ya Guhindura yizewe na Axelar Interchain Token Service. Iyo uhinduye, BNBTiger yawe iratwikwa burundu kandi ukakira TigerOG ku gipimo cya 1:1. Uburyo bwo gutwika bwemeza ko ingano yose icungwa neza ku minyururu yose.
questions.a3: Freedom Bridge ubwayo ntabwo yishyuza amafaranga yo guhindura. Wishyura gusa amafaranga asanzwe ya blockchain gas. Kohereza hagati y'iminyururu birimo amafaranga ya gas ya cross-chain yishyurwa kuri Axelar kugirango yishyure ikiguzi cyo kohereza.
questions.a4: Tokens za TigerOG zikora kimwe n'izindi token zose za ERC20. Niba utakaje uburenganzira ku mufuka wawe, ntizishobora kugarurwa. Buri gihe bika neza imfunguzo zawe bwite n'interuro zo kugarura.
questions.q5: Ese nshobora guhindura tokens zanjye za TigerOG nkazisubiza kuri BNBTiger?
questions.a5: Oya. Kwimuka ni uguhindura inzira imwe. Iyo uhinduye BNBTiger muri TigerOG, tokens zawe za BNBTiger ziratwikwa burundu (zoherezwa kuri aderesi yapfuye). Ibi ni nkana — TigerOG ni verisiyo nshya, itagira umusoro yagenewe gusimbura burundu token ya kera.
questions.a6: Dushyigikiye iminyururu myinshi ya EVM binyuze kuri Axelar, harimo BNB Chain, Ethereum, Base, n'izindi. Reba Wiki kugirango ubone urutonde rwuzuye rw'imiyoboro ishyigikiwe.
questions.a7: Umuvuduko wo kohereza biterwa n'igihe cy'iherezo cy'urunigi rw'inkomoko n'iyohereza rya Axelar. Mubisanzwe, kohereza hagati y'iminyururu bifata nka muminota 2-5.
questions.q8: Ni izihe ngano ziri mu isoko za tokens za OG?
questions.a8: Buri token ya OG ifite ingano idahinduka mu isoko ikomoka kuri token ya BNB y'umwimerere, ibara tokens zatwitswe, amafaranga ya contract yafunganye, na LP yafunze. TigerOG: ~3.66 septillion (36.62% by'umwimerere). LionOG: ~3.83 septillion (38.33% by'umwimerere). FrogOG: ~8.39 septillion (83.86% by'umwimerere). Reba Wiki kugirango ubone ibisobanuro birambuye.
questions.q9: Kuki amasezerano ya OG atigeze arekwa (renounced)?
questions.a9: Kureka amasezerano byakuraho ubushobozi bwo guteza imbere no kongeraho imiyoboro mishya mu gihe kizaza. N'ubwo amasezerano atazarekwa vuba, bisaba imikono myinshi (multisig) kugirango hagire igihinduka. Kandi, nta tokens cyangwa imisoro byagenewe itsinda.
questions.q10: Kuki amasezerano ya OG ashobora gucurwa (mintable)?
questions.a10: Kwambuka urunigi bisaba ubushobozi bwo gucura/gutwika - tokens ziratwikwa iyo zivuye ku runigi kandi zigacurwa iyo zihageze. Ibi bigumisha ingano rusange ihamye ku miyoboro yose. Gucura bigenzurwa na multisig Safe wallet.
questions.q11: Ese TigerOG irava kuri BNB Chain ijya kuri Axelar?
questions.a11: Oya. Axelar ntabwo ari blockchain - ni protocol y'ikiraro ihuza imiyoboro. BNB Chain iguma ari urunigi rw'inkomoko aho uhindurira tokens za kera. Axelar ituma gusa tokens zawe zishobora kugenda hagati ya BNB, Ethereum, Base, n'indi miyoboro ishyigikiwe.
questions.a12: Menya neza ko wongeyeho urunigi na aderesi ya token mu mufuka wawe. Urashobora kubona aderesi zose z'amasezerano ku rupapuro rwa Contracts. Itsinda rya Tiger rikoresha Rabby wallet yoroshya gucunga imiyoboro myinshi.
questions.q13: Kuki kohereza uva kuri Ethereum cyangwa Base bifata igihe kinini?
questions.a13: Ethereum isaba ibihe bibiri (epochs) mbere yo kurangiza ibikorwa kugirango umutekano ube mwinshi. Kubera ko Base ikorera kuri Ethereum, nayo igira uku gutinda. Ibi biha umutekano umwanya w'imbere kuruta umuvuduko - tokens zawe zifite umutekano, ihangane.
questions.q14: Byagenda bite ninkomeza gukoresha token yanjye y'umwimerere singire iyo mpindura?
questions.a14: Nta mpamvu yo kwihutira guhindura. BNBTiger na TigerOG bizahora bifite ibidendezi by'imari bitandukanye, agaciro ku isoko, n'ibindi. Ariko BNBTiger ifite umusoro mwinshi naho TigerOG nta musoro igira mu bucuruzi. Kubera ko imisoro ku y'umwimerere idakoreshwa mu gushyigikira umushinga, iterambere rikorwa n'itsinda rya CTO kuri TigerOG. Freedom Bridge na multi-chain ni ibya TigerOG gusa.
questions.q15: Hari umusoro wo guhindura? Ese TigerOG ifite umusoro?
questions.a15: Oya. Byishyurwa gusa amafaranga asanzwe ya gas yo guhindura no gucuruza. Nta misoro cyangwa amafaranga yandi, kandi TigerOG ni amasezerano atagira umusoro.
questions.q16: Ese nshobora kugura no gucuruza TigerOG ako kanya?
questions.a16: Ntarabishoboka. Itsinda ntirirakusanya amafaranga n'imisoro kugirango ribashe gutera inkunga ibidendezi by'imari binini bihagije. Kugirango ubone TigerOG ubu, ugomba kugura cyangwa kuba usanganywe iy'umwimerere hanyuma ukayihindura. Iyo umaze gutunga TigerOG, ntizoroha gucuruzwa kugeza abashoramari baje kongera ku kidendezi cy'imari.
questions.q17: Kuki agaciro ka TigerOG ku isoko kagaragara nk'akagipfupfu?
questions.a17: Uko ikidendezi cy'imari kiba gito, niko ubucuruzi buto bugira ingaruka nini ku gaciro kagaragara ku isoko. Ibi bizakemuka igihe abashoramari bazaba batanze imari.
questions.a18: Freedom Bridge ntabwo yanyuze mu bugenzuzi bwa gatatu bwemewe. Gusa, code y'amasezerano ahindura ishingiye kuri SHx converter yubatswe n'itsinda rya Stronghold (abahoze ari abasirikare ba XRP na Stellar baherutse kwerekana i Davos). Ibikorwa remezo byo kohereza bikoreshwa na Axelar, yanyuze mu bugenzuzi bw'umutekano bwinshi.
questions.q19: Freedom Bridge irinda ite ibitero bya hackers cyangwa exploits?
questions.a19:
Hari ingamba nyinshi zafashwe:

• Uhindura abika gusa ingano nyayo ikenewe mu isoko - nta tokens zirenze zishobora kwibwa
• Uhindura nta burenganzira bwo gucura (mint) afite
• Code yose y'amasezerano igenzurwa kuri chain kandi ni open source
• Uburenganzira bwa Token bwizewe muri Safe.global multisig wallet
• Kohereza bikorwa n'ibikorwa remezo bya Axelar byageragejwe ku rugamba
questions.q20: Ese kohereza ntibisubizwa inyuma? Byagenda bite niba kohereza byanze?
questions.a20: Kohereza bishobora rimwe na rimwe guhagarara kubera gas idahagije cyangwa ubucucike bw'umuyoboro. Ibi nibiba, ushobora gukurikirana igikorwa cyawe kuri Axelarscan ukongeramo gas wowe ubwawe kugirango kirangire. Axelar itanga ibikoresho byo kugarura ibikorwa - ntabwo uzabura tokens zawe.
questions.q21: Ni izihe ngaruka zijyanye no gukoresha Freedom Bridge?
questions.a21: Nk'uko bimeze kuri protocol yose ya DeFi, hari ingaruka zihari harimo ingaruka z'amasezerano y'ubwenge, ingaruka z'ikiraro, n'ihindagurika ry'isoko. Turagusaba gukora ubushakashatsi bwawe (DYOR) no gukoresha gusa amafaranga ushobora kwemera gutakaza. Reba ubutumwa bwacu bw'amategeko kugirango ubone ibisobanuro birambuye.
questions.q22: Ese nshobora guhindura amasezerano mashya ya BNB Tiger Inu (Nzeri 2025)?
questions.a22: Oya. Freedom Bridge ishyigikiye gusa token ya BNB Tiger y'umwimerere/ishaje yatangijwe imyaka mike ishize - ntabwo ari amasezerano mashya yakozwe muri Nzeri 2025. Freedom Bridge yubatswe ku bw'imiyoboro y'abaturage (CTO) ya Tiger, Lion, na Frog y'umwimerere.
questions.a23: Kongeraho imari ni igikorwa cya DeFi gisaba ubumenyi gifite ingaruka harimo gutakaza by'agateganyo (impermanent loss). Niba ufite uburambe bwo gutanga imari kuri DEX nka PancakeSwap cyangwa Uniswap, inzira ni imwe - huza token ya OG n'umutungo w'ibanze.
questions.a24: Oya. Nta buryo bwo gukora 'rug pull'. Nta tokens cyangwa imisoro byagenewe itsinda, kandi ntitwakira amafaranga yo kohereza — ayo ajya kuri Axelar kubera ikiguzi cyo kohereza. Itsinda rigizwe n'abatunzi nkawe, bari kubaka ibi ku giti cyabo. Umufuka w'itsinda rukumbi ni umufuka w'iyamamaza rusange uterwa inkunga n'impano z'abaturage. Multisig Safe wallet igenzura uburenganzira bw'amasezerano nko guhagarika kohereza ku miyoboro mu gihe cy'ibihe bidasanzwe, ariko ntishobora kugera cyangwa kuyobora amafaranga y'abakoresha.

disclaimer.title: Ubutumwa bw'Amategeko
disclaimer.subtitle: Nyamuneka soma ubu butumwa witonze mbere yo gukoresha Freedom Bridge.

noInvestmentAdvice.title: Ntabwo ari Inama y'Ishoramari
noInvestmentAdvice.content: Amakuru atangwa kuri Freedom Bridge ntabwo ari inama y'ishoramari, inama y'imari, inama y'ubucuruzi, cyangwa ubundi bwoko bw'inama. Ntugomba gufata ibirimo nk'ibyo. Freedom Bridge ntabwo igutera inkunga yo kugura, kugurisha, cyangwa kubika cryptocurrency iyo ari yo yose. Kora ubushakashatsi bwawe kandi uvugane n'umujyanama wawe w'imari mbere yo gufata ibyemezo by'ishoramari.

risksOfUse.title: Ingaruka z'Imikoreshereze
risksOfUse.content:
Isoko rya cryptocurrency rirahindagurika kandi ntiriteganywa. Mu gukoresha Freedom Bridge, wemeye kandi wakiriye ko:

• Amasezerano y'ubwenge ashobora kugira amakosa cyangwa intege nke zishobora gutuma utakaza amafaranga
• Ibiraro bya cross-chain bifite ingaruka zihari harimo ariko bitagarukira gusa kuri: kunanirwa kwa oracle, ubufatanye bw'abagenzuzi, n'ubucucike bw'umuyoboro
• Agaciro ka token gashobora guhinduka cyane kandi ushobora gutakaza igice cyangwa ishoramari ryawe ryose
• Ibikorwa ku miyoboro ya blockchain ntibishobora guhindurwa
• Amafaranga y'umuyoboro n'ikiguzi cya gas biri hanze y'ubushobozi bwacu kandi bishobora guhinduka cyane

noWarranties.title: Nta Bwishingizi
noWarranties.content: Freedom Bridge itangwa "nk'uko iri" kandi "nk'uko iboneka" nta bwishingizi ubwo ari bwo bwose, bwaba ubugaragara cyangwa ubwumvikana. Ntitwizeza ko serivisi izakora idahagarara, itekanye, cyangwa itarimo amakosa. Ntitutanga ubwishingizi ku bijyanye n'ukuri, kwizerwa, cyangwa ukuzura kw'amakuru atangwa binyuze kuri platform.

limitationOfLiability.title: Imbibi z'Uburyozwe
limitationOfLiability.content: Ku rugero ntarengwa rwemerwa n'amategeko, Freedom Bridge, abayiteza imbere, abaterankunga, n'abayishamikiyeho ntibazabazwa ibyangiritire byose byaba ibiziguye, ibitaziguye, ibitunguranye, ibidasanzwe, ibyakurikiyeho, cyangwa ibihano bivuye mu gukoresha platform kwawe, harimo ariko bitagarukira gusa ku gutakaza inyungu, gutakaza amakuru, cyangwa gutakaza umutungo wa cryptocurrency.

thirdPartyServices.title: Serivisi z'Abandi
thirdPartyServices.content: Freedom Bridge ihuzwa na serivisi z'abandi harimo Axelar Network yo kohereza hagati y'iminyururu. Ntitubazwa ibikorwa, ibirimo, amakuru, cyangwa data by'abo bandi. Imikoreshereze yawe ya serivisi z'abandi igengwa n'amabwiriza n'amategeko yabo.

regulatoryCompliance.title: Kubahiriza Amabwiriza
regulatoryCompliance.content: Amabwiriza ya cryptocurrency aratandukana bitewe n'ububasha. Ni inshingano zawe wenyine kumenya niba imikoreshereze yawe ya Freedom Bridge ijyanye n'amategeko n'amabwiriza yose akurikizwa mu bubasha bwawe. Freedom Bridge ntikora ubuvugizi ku bijyanye n'ubwemezo bw'amategeko bwa serivisi mu bubasha ubwo ari bwo bwose.

dyor.title: Kora Ubushakashatsi Bwawe (DYOR)
dyor.content: Buri gihe kora ubushakashatsi bwawe (DYOR) mbere yo gukorana na protocol iyo ari yo yose ya DeFi. Genzura aderesi z'amasezerano, usobanukirwe imikorere ya token iyo ari yo yose mukorana, kandi ntiwigere ushora imari zirenze izo ushobora kwemera gutakaza.

disclaimer.acknowledgment: Mu gukoresha Freedom Bridge, wemeye ko wasomye, wasobanukiwe, kandi wemeye kubahiriza ubu butumwa.

disclaimerModal.title: Ubutumwa Bw'ingenzi
disclaimerModal.subtitle: Nyamuneka soma kandi wemeze mbere yo gukomeza.
disclaimerModal.noAdvice: Freedom Bridge ntitanga inama z'ishoramari, imari, cyangwa ubucuruzi. Ishoramari rya cryptocurrency rirahindagurika kandi ririmo ingaruka.
disclaimerModal.risks: Mu gukoresha iyi platform, wemeye ko amasezerano y'ubwenge ashobora kugira intege nke, ibiraro bya cross-chain bifite ingaruka zihari, kandi ibikorwa ntibishobora guhindurwa.
disclaimerModal.dyor: Buri gihe kora ubushakashatsi bwawe (DYOR) kandi ukoreshe gusa amafaranga ushobora kwemera gutakaza.

common.failedToSwitchNetwork: Guhindura umuyoboro byanze. Nyamuneka hindura mu bwite mu mufuka wawe.
